ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Bard's Guild on Povar
ygData.msgSnippet: I would imagine that they have a very close alliance with the all-necro guild and the all-clerics-who-do-resses guild.  In my experience, 2 bards in one
ygData.messageBody:
I would imagine that they have a very close alliance with the all-necro
guild and the all-clerics-who-do-resses guild. <eg>

In my experience, 2 bards in one hunting - not ressing - party was a waste
of a slot. And 3 bards in a hunting party meant certain death. With 4 bards,
I would simply /shudder but have never had that experience.

Class diversity provides synergy. The whole can be greater than the sum of
the parts. Having 2 of any class in a group has problems and that includes 2
warriors, imho. Maybe not a problem for the bard but certainly a problem for
the cleric. I know that some ppl do dragon and god groups with 2 war, 2
clr, 1 bard and someone to take the HT/DT but for your daily grind - two of
anything can be less than desirable.

Sylly Songsynger

p.s. there is an all bard guild on Innoruuk: Miraculous Muscians.

p.s.s. "I would not want to join any club that would have me for a member."
(was that W.C. Fields or Groucho Marx?)


----- Original Message -----
From: "Elijah Meeker" <emeeker@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, August 07, 2000 11:14 AM
Subject: [eqbards] Bard's Guild on Povar


> So, there is now an all-bard guild on Povar, the Songweavers of Povar" I
> think. I have been asked twice if I was interested, and while I usually
make
> it a point to not join any guild who would ask me to join cold, I am
curious
> about them. Anyone ever run across them? Are they on other servers? I am
> VERY curious what guild hunts look like :)
>
> Tszaaz
